TheLich:Soul_Jar_Relic.NAME: Soul Jar
TheLich:Soul_Jar_Relic.FLAVOR: A jar that seems to contain the life essence of someone or something.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would die, heal to full health instead.(use once)

TheLich:Zombie_hand.NAME: Zombie hand
TheLich:Zombie_hand.FLAVOR: A rotting hand. It is still moving. Longing to be reunited with its body again.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of a battle. Summon a zombie.

TheLich:Ceremonial_dagger.NAME: Ceremonial dagger
TheLich:Ceremonial_dagger.FLAVOR: A dagger. Painted with ritualistic symbols.

TheLich:False_idol.NAME: False idol
TheLich:False_idol.FLAVOR: A mysterious statue. You get the urge to worship it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. When you sacrifice a minion draw one fleshrot.

TheLich:StaffOfContaminationRelic.NAME: Staff of contamination
TheLich:StaffOfContaminationRelic.FLAVOR: A creepy looking staff. It smells of illness
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain poison from fleshrot. Your minions gain 1 poison as well. Poisoned minion attacks apply poison to their target.

TheLich:CommandingHandRelic.NAME: Commanding hand
DESCRIPTIONS: When you summon a zombie, it gains high priority.

TheLich:StrongJawRelic.NAME: Strong jaw
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds a cannibalize card at the start of every turn.

TheLich:SummoningFocusRelic.NAME: Summoning Focus
DESCRIPTIONS: When a summoned minion starts with summoning sickness, it starts with poison instead. Poisoned minions apply poison during their attacks.
